user_meta.anchor_title: Born on the Fourth of July

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: I understand that you're looking for a story with a vibe similar to "Her" - something unexpected and thought-provoking. Based on your preferences for war movies from 2012, starring Zach Mills (although he's not in any of these), directed by McG or Steven Soderbergh, and written in Korean (none of the listed movies meet this criteria), I recommend "Oldboy". This intense psychological thriller follows a man's quest for revenge after being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years. With its dark and suspenseful tone, it might scratch that unexpected itch!
